name: Evaluator
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint
Evaluator
description:
Helps to evaluate program state at the location of breakpoint during executing. The program state, such as local variables and call stack, are retrieved using Ruby Binding objects.

The breakpoints may consist of conditional expression and other code expressions. The Evaluator helps evaluates these expression in a read-only context. Meaning if the expressions trigger any write operations in middle of the evaluation, the evaluator is able to abort the operation and prevent the program state from being altered.

The evaluated results are saved onto the breakpoints fields. See Stackdriver Breakpoints Doc for details.

methods.name: eval_call_stack
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint
Evaluator.eval_call_stack
methods.description: Evaluates call stack. Collects function name and location of each frame from given binding objects. Collects local variable information from top frames.

params.name: call_stack_bindings
params.description:
A list of binding
objects that come from each of the call stack frames.

returns.description:
A list of StackFrame objects that represent state of the
call stack

methods.name: eval_condition
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint
Evaluator.eval_condition
methods.description: Evaluates a boolean conditional expression in the given context binding. The evaluation subjects to the read-only rules. If the expression does any write operation, the evaluation aborts and returns false.

params.name: binding
params.description: The binding object from the context

params.name: condition
params.description: A string of code to be evaluates

returns.description:
True if condition expression read-only evaluates
to true. Otherwise false.

methods.name: eval_expressions
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint
Evaluator.eval_expressions
methods.description: Evaluates the breakpoint expressions at the point that triggered the breakpoint. The expressions subject to the read-only rules. If the expressions do any write operations, the evaluations abort and show an error message in place of the real result.

params.name: binding
params.description: The binding object from the context

params.name: expressions
params.description:
A list of code strings to be
evaluated

returns.description:
A list of Breakpoint::Variables objects that represent the
expression evaluations results.

params.name: message_format
params.description: The message with with expression placeholders such as $0, $1, etc.

params.name: expressions
params.description:
An array of evaluated expression variables to be
placed into message_formatâ€™s placeholders. The variables need
to have type equal String.
